title: Is the first track you ever produced still available for your fans? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, besides a cassette tape that I have then no one has it, there's an outside chance that 1 or more of the vinyl exist but your talking 28 years ago and limited to 100… my oldest release available online is from 1999 and it's still on the website I uploaded it to, soundclick, which predates SoundCloud by years and despite the site having several overhauls and the internet itself evolving it hosts some of my oldest music 1999–2004 all of which were produced using obsolete computers and software

The first track I ever produced is not even available to ME anymore. I did find a tape of it not too long ago…long since degraded and warbly. It’s all from the days before cheap digital storage and backups. Plus, back then barely anyone had it in the first place, so there weren’t a lot of copies anyway. My second track, though…that’s still out on the internet somewhere, if you look hard enough. It’s not very good, and bears no resemblance to subsequent works, but…it exists.
